meanings.definition: A type of antelope found in India.
meanings.sent1: The nandin gracefully roamed the grasslands.
meanings.sent2: I saw a nandin while on a safari in India.
meanings.sent3: The nandin decided to join the dance party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as free as a nandin running across the plains.
meanings.sent5: The nandin's horns curved elegantly as it moved.

meanings.definition: A male given name in India.
meanings.sent1: Nandin is a popular name for boys in India.
meanings.sent2: My friend's brother is named Nandin.
meanings.sent3: Nandin always brings a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: His presence in the room was as strong as a lion named Nandin.
meanings.sent5: When Nandin laughs, it brightens up the whole room.
